features.title: Start a Container
features.description: With Podman Desktop, you can start a container from an image on your container engine. You can interact with the running container by using the terminal or by opening your browser to the exposed ports.

features.title: Explore Kubernetes
features.description: Podman Desktop and Podman have many features allowing easy migration from containers to Kubernetes. Inspect, configure, and orchestrate your pods, services, and deployments with ease.

features.title: Install Extensions
features.description: Installing an extension is a great way to expand the capabilities of Podman Desktop. You have the option to install an extension from the catalog or a custom extension of your choice.

features.title: Manage Docker
features.description: With Podman Desktop, you can configure a Docker-compatible environment using the Settings page. After configuration, your Docker tools are directed to use the Podman engine and your Compose application can be run using the Podman CLI.
